## Learning Objectives

By the end of this discussion, you will be able to:

- use `dpois()`, `ppois()`, `qpois()`, `rpois()` for Poisson distributions.
- use `ddunif()`, `pdunif()`, `qdunif()`, `rdunif()` for discrete uniform distributions.
